title: 99% Invisible-44- The Pruitt-Igoe Myth
description: The Pruitt-Igoe housing project in St. Louis became most famous at the moment of its demise. The thirty-three high-rise towers built in the 1950’s were supposed to solve the impending population crisis in inner city St. Louis. It was supposed … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
